FuncDef:
The max-response-time command sets a global maximum response time of IGMP Query messages.
The undo max-response-time command restores the default value. The max-response-time command sets a global maximum response time of IGMP Query messages. The undo max-response-time command restores the default value. By default, the maximum response time for IGMP Query messages is 10 seconds.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the maximum response time of IGMP Query messages.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 25, in seconds.
